title: Explain Complex Code
description: Explains a complex snippet of code in simple terms.
prompt_text: Please explain the following code snippet in simple terms, breaking down what each part does and how they work together: [INSERT CODE HERE]

title: Debug Python Script
description: Identifies and fixes errors in a Python script.
prompt_text: I have a Python script that is throwing an error. Please analyze the code, identify the bug, and provide a corrected version with an explanation of the fix: [INSERT CODE HERE]

title: Generate React Component
description: Creates a functional React component with specified props.
prompt_text: Create a functional React component named [COMPONENT NAME] that accepts the following props: [LIST PROPS]. The component should [DESCRIBE FUNCTIONALITY]. use Tailwind CSS for styling.

title: SQL Query Optimization
description: Optimizes a slow SQL query for better performance.
prompt_text: Here is a SQL query that is running slowly on a large dataset: [INSERT QUERY]. Please suggest optimizations or rewrite the query to improve performance, explaining your changes.

title: Pandas Data Cleaning
description: Script to clean and preprocess a dataset using Pandas.
prompt_text: I have a dataset loaded into a Pandas DataFrame. Write a Python script to perform the following cleaning tasks: handle missing values in [COLUMN], convert [COLUMN] to datetime, and remove duplicates based on [COLUMN].

title: Midjourney Portrait Prompt
description: Detailed prompt for a realistic portrait in Midjourney.
prompt_text: Create a detailed prompt for Midjourney to generate a hyper-realistic portrait of [SUBJECT]. Include details about lighting (e.g., cinematic, softbox), camera settings (e.g., 85mm, f/1.8), and style (e.g., highly detailed, 8k).

title: Blog Post Outline
description: Generates a structured outline for a blog post.
prompt_text: Create a detailed outline for a blog post titled "[TITLE]". The post should target [AUDIENCE] and cover the following key points: [POINT 1], [POINT 2], [POINT 3]. Include a catchy introduction and a strong conclusion.

title: Professional Email Rewrite
description: Rewrites an email to be more professional and concise.
prompt_text: Rewrite the following email draft to be more professional, concise, and polite. The goal is to [GOAL, e.g., ask for a meeting]: [INSERT DRAFT]

title: Meeting Agenda Generator
description: Creates a structured agenda for a business meeting.
prompt_text: Draft a meeting agenda for a [DURATION] minute meeting about [TOPIC]. The attendees are [ROLES]. Include time slots for introduction, key discussion points, Q&A, and action items.

title: SWOT Analysis
description: Performs a SWOT analysis for a product or company.
prompt_text: Conduct a SWOT analysis (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) for [COMPANY/PRODUCT]. Focus on [SPECIFIC ASPECT, e.g., market position, technology].

title: Regex Generator
description: Generates a regular expression for a specific pattern.
prompt_text: Write a regular expression (Regex) that matches [PATTERN DESCRIPTION, e.g., email addresses, phone numbers in format X]. Explain how the regex works.

title: Unit Test Writer
description: Writes unit tests for a given function using Jest.
prompt_text: Write comprehensive unit tests for the following JavaScript function using Jest. Include test cases for valid inputs, invalid inputs, and edge cases: [INSERT CODE]

title: Excel Formula Helper
description: Creates a complex Excel formula for a specific task.
prompt_text: I need an Excel formula that [DESCRIBE TASK, e.g., sums column A if column B contains 'X' and column C is greater than 10]. Explain how the formula works.

title: Social Media Caption
description: Generates engaging captions for social media posts.
prompt_text: Write 3 engaging Instagram captions for a photo of [DESCRIPTION OF IMAGE]. The tone should be [TONE, e.g., fun, inspirational]. Include relevant hashtags.

title: Product Description
description: Writes a compelling product description for e-commerce.
prompt_text: Write a compelling product description for [PRODUCT NAME]. Highlight its key features: [FEATURE 1], [FEATURE 2]. The target audience is [AUDIENCE].

title: Study Plan Creator
description: Creates a structured study plan for learning a new skill.
prompt_text: Create a 4-week study plan to learn [SKILL/TOPIC]. I can dedicate [HOURS] hours per week. Break it down by week with specific topics and resources/exercises.

title: Language Translation
description: Translates text while preserving tone and context.
prompt_text: Translate the following text from [SOURCE LANGUAGE] to [TARGET LANGUAGE]. Ensure the tone remains [TONE] and the meaning is preserved: [INSERT TEXT]

title: Git Commit Message
description: Generates a clear and descriptive Git commit message.
prompt_text: Write a clear and concise Git commit message for the following changes: [DESCRIBE CHANGES]. Follow conventional commits format if possible.

title: Logo Design Brief
description: Creates a design brief for a logo.
prompt_text: Write a design brief for a logo for a company named [NAME]. They are in the [INDUSTRY] industry. The logo should convey [VALUES/ATTRIBUTES]. Preferred colors are [COLORS].

title: API Documentation
description: Generates documentation for an API endpoint.
prompt_text: Write documentation for the following API endpoint: [METHOD] [URL]. It accepts [PARAMETERS] and returns [RESPONSE STRUCTURE]. Include example requests and responses.

title: Video Script
description: Writes a script for a short YouTube video.
prompt_text: Write a script for a 5-minute YouTube video about [TOPIC]. The video should be informative and entertaining. Include an intro, 3 main points, and a call to action.

title: Job Description
description: Drafts a job description for a specific role.
prompt_text: Draft a job description for a [JOB TITLE] at a [COMPANY TYPE]. Key responsibilities include [RESPONSIBILITIES]. Required skills are [SKILLS].

title: Newsletter Intro
description: Writes a catchy introduction for an email newsletter.
prompt_text: Write a catchy introduction for a weekly newsletter about [TOPIC]. The theme of this week's issue is [THEME]. Hook the reader to keep reading.

title: Data Visualization Idea
description: Suggests visualization types for specific data.
prompt_text: I have data regarding [DATA DESCRIPTION, e.g., sales over time by region]. What are the best ways to visualize this data to highlight [INSIGHT NEEDED]? Explain why.

title: Code Review Checklist
description: Generates a checklist for code reviews.
prompt_text: Create a checklist for reviewing code in a [LANGUAGE/FRAMEWORK] project. Include checks for performance, security, readability, and adherence to best practices.

title: Book Summary
description: Summarizes the key takeaways from a book.
prompt_text: Provide a summary of the book "[BOOK TITLE]" by [AUTHOR]. Highlight the top 5 key takeaways and how they can be applied in real life.

title: Interview Questions
description: Generates interview questions for a candidate.
prompt_text: Generate 10 interview questions for a [JOB ROLE] candidate. Include a mix of technical, behavioral, and situational questions.

title: SEO Keywords
description: Generates SEO keywords for a specific topic.
prompt_text: Generate a list of 20 high-potential SEO keywords for a website about [TOPIC]. Include long-tail keywords and questions users might search for.

title: Error Handling Strategy
description: Suggests an error handling strategy for an app.
prompt_text: Propose a robust error handling strategy for a [TYPE OF APP, e.g., Node.js API]. Cover how to log errors, what to return to the client, and how to handle critical failures.

title: Recipe Generator
description: Generates a recipe based on available ingredients.
prompt_text: I have the following ingredients: [LIST INGREDIENTS]. Suggest a delicious recipe I can make. Include step-by-step cooking instructions.

title: React Custom Hook
description: Creates a custom React hook for specific logic.
prompt_text: Create a custom React hook named [HOOK NAME] that handles [FUNCTIONALITY, e.g., fetching data with cache]. It should return [RETURN VALUES].

title: SQL Schema Design
description: Designs a database schema for an application.
prompt_text: Design a relational database schema for a [APP TYPE, e.g., library management system]. List the tables, columns, primary keys, and foreign key relationships.

title: Landing Page Copy
description: Writes copy for a landing page.
prompt_text: Write the copy for a landing page promoting [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include a headline, subheadline, benefits section, social proof, and a call to action.

title: Typescript Interface
description: Generates TypeScript interfaces for data structures.
prompt_text: Generate TypeScript interfaces for the following JSON data: [INSERT JSON]. Ensure proper typing for nested objects and arrays.

title: Project Timeline
description: Creates a timeline for a project.
prompt_text: Create a project timeline for [PROJECT NAME]. The project starts on [START DATE] and ends on [END DATE]. Key milestones include [MILESTONES].

title: Midjourney Architecture
description: Prompt for architectural rendering.
prompt_text: Create a Midjourney prompt for a modern [BUILDING TYPE] designed by [ARCHITECT STYLE]. Use descriptors like 'minimalist', 'sustainable materials', 'natural light', and 'photorealistic'.

title: Python Script Optimization
description: Optimizes Python code for speed.
prompt_text: Review the following Python code and suggest changes to improve its execution speed using libraries like NumPy or better algorithms: [INSERT CODE]

title: Press Release
description: Writes a press release for a new announcement.
prompt_text: Write a press release announcing [NEWS/EVENT]. Include a dateline, headline, body paragraphs with quotes, and contact information.

title: User Story Writer
description: Writes user stories for agile development.
prompt_text: Write 5 user stories for a [APP FEATURE]. Follow the format: 'As a [USER ROLE], I want to [ACTION], so that [BENEFIT]'. include acceptance criteria.

title: CSS Grid Layout
description: Generates CSS Grid code for a specific layout.
prompt_text: Write the CSS code to create a [LAYOUT TYPE, e.g., 3-column masonry] layout using CSS Grid. The layout should be responsive.

title: Docker Compose File
description: Creates a docker-compose.yml file.
prompt_text: Create a `docker-compose.yml` file for a full-stack application with a Node.js backend, React frontend, and PostgreSQL database. Include volume mapping and environment variables.

title: Cold Email Template
description: Writes a cold email for sales or networking.
prompt_text: Write a cold email to a potential client offering [SERVICE]. Keep it under 150 words. Focus on their pain points and how you can solve them.

title: SVG Icon Generator
description: Generates SVG code for an icon.
prompt_text: Generate the SVG code for a simple, flat-style icon of a [OBJECT]. Use a [COLOR] color scheme.

title: Security Audit Checklist
description: Checklist for web application security.
prompt_text: Create a security audit checklist for a web application. Cover areas like authentication, authorization, data encryption, XSS/CSRF protection, and dependency management.

title: Motivational Speech
description: Writes a short motivational speech.
prompt_text: Write a short, powerful motivational speech for a team that is facing a difficult deadline. Inspire them to push through and deliver quality work.

title: Linux Command Helper
description: Explains or provides Linux commands.
prompt_text: How do I [TASK, e.g., find all files larger than 100MB] in Linux using the command line? Explain the command flags used.

title: Brand Slogan Generator
description: Generates catchy slogans for a brand.
prompt_text: Brainstorm 10 catchy slogans for a new brand of [PRODUCT]. The brand values are [VALUES]. The tone should be [TONE].

title: React Context API
description: Example of using React Context for state management.
prompt_text: Show me how to set up a React Context for managing [STATE, e.g., user authentication]. Include the provider component and a custom hook to consume the context.

title: Resume Bullet Points
description: Improves resume bullet points.
prompt_text: Rewrite the following resume bullet points to be more impact-driven, using action verbs and quantifying results where possible: [INSERT BULLET POINTS]

title: Algorithm Explanation
description: Explains a computer science algorithm.
prompt_text: Explain the [ALGORITHM, e.g., Dijkstra's algorithm] step-by-step. Use a real-world analogy to make it easier to understand.
